item.title: Walmart is selling a $90 heated neck and shoulder massager for $38
item.description: The hands-free device can be used to target pain in other areas of the body as well.

item.title: Dave Ramsey warns Americans on critical Medicare problem
item.description: The personal finance radio host sounds the alarm as Medicare's Annual Enrollment Period draws near.

item.title: Soaring student loans are weighing on the economy
item.description: Here's why consumer bankruptcies are growing and likely to be bigger ahead.

item.title: Struggling Las Vegas Strip resort casinos get more bad news
item.description: A major project that would have made Las Vegas more accessible to millions just hit a major roadblock.

item.title: Beloved sporting goods retailer closing after 41 years
item.description: After 41 years, this key regional retailer can't afford to keep its doors open.
